readonly.description: Whether it is read-only or not

scroll-to-error.description: Whether to scroll to the failed form item when the validation fails, with the optional value 'start' end
scroll-to-error.description_zh: 是否在效验不通过时滚动到不通过的表单项，可选值为 `start` end

scroll-to-error-offset-y.description: Scroll to the position offset of the form item that failed the validation
scroll-to-error-offset-y.description_zh: 滚动到校验不通过的表单项的位置偏移量

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Triggers validation of all form components
methods.description_zh: 触发所有表单组件的校验

methods.name: resetValidation
methods.description: Clear the validation information of all form components
methods.description_zh: 清空所有表单组件的校验信息

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Clear the values and validation information bound to all form components
methods.description_zh: 清空所有表单组件绑定的值和校验信息
